original_text: Some of the soldiers went to King Saul and they told him what David had said. Saul told David to come to him.
korean_text: 어떤 사람이 다윗이 한 말을 듣고 그것을 사울에게 전하였으므로 사울이 다윗을 부른지라

sentences.original_text: Some of the soldiers went to King Saul
and they told him what David had said
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 다윗이 말한 것을 그에게 알렸습니다

sentences.original_text: Saul told David to come to him
